Question: Which statements are true regarding the relationships among Mark, Sestero, and Wiseau in the production of *The Room*?
Options:
A. Sestero played the character 'Mark' after the original actor was fired.
B. Sestero and Wiseau had a friendship before production began.
C. Wiseau relinquished the director title during the filming.
D. Wiseau refused to give up the director title despite challenges during filming.
Answer: A) Sestero played the character 'Mark' after the original actor was fired., B) Sestero and Wiseau had a friendship before production began., D) Wiseau refused to give up the director title despite challenges during filming.
